name: Petz Fantasy: Sunshine Magic
description:
'Petz Fantasy: Sunshine Magic' is a virtual pet simulator, in which the player takes a bundle of unique mythical animals under their wing. Released in both the US and EU, it was published by Ubisoft for the Nintendo DS on October 5th, 2010. It is part of a dual set, the other being titled 'Petz Fantasy: Moonlight Magic'.

Petz, the #1 handheld pet-simulation brand in 2009, is introducing a new nurturing experience with an all-new type of pet: Fantasy Petz! For the first time, discover and take care of your very own fantasy pets. Enter a world of fantasy where you discover mysterious eggs that hatch into cute fantasy creatures in Petz Fantasy: Sunshine Magic & Petz Fantasy: Moonlight Magic. Each fantasy creature has its own personality, surprising reactions and magical powers. Help them grow by caring for them, feeding them and teaching them their magical powers. Above all, keep your fantasy Petz a secret from your parents!
